introduction_text: Application for Admission to Shishuvan Nursery Batch 2018-19.
name: nursery-admission-form
payment_button_help:
* Your application will not be accepted unless you make the payment.

*Please preserve a soft/hard copy of your application for your future reference

*Once you make the payment you will not be able to change the application.

* Please make note of the Application no, (N.xxxxxxxx) which should be used for all further correspondence

On making payment, it is understood that the information/particulars furnished by you in admission form are correct and true. You have read the information about the admission process and the school's pedagogy and philosophy. You agree to accept and abide by them
title: Nursery Admission Application

web_form_fields.options:
"There is no such thing as perfect parent . So just be a real one " ........ SUE ATKINS


Dear prospective parent,

As you embark on the journey to choose the right school for your child we encourage both the parents to discuss the questions and respond jointly, Your responses should be thoughtful and honest rather than lengthy.

Wishing you all the best!

-Shishuvan

A note on Philosophy and Pedagogy

web_form_fields.options:
• Teacher: The teacher will be called by her/his first name. This increases the quality of the relationship and diminishes the distance that power creates between teachers and students. We value expertise, and the ability of teachers to learn on the job and stay abreast of technology more than the number of years they have spent on the planet. The school believes that respect is earned by the actions of our teachers and that children will learn that they need to act in a way that make them equally worthy of respect.

• Textbooks: The school does not subscribe to any text-books until Std IX, as the ICSE does not recommend and require any compulsory text books until then. Instead of limiting students to textbook knowledge, I know that Shishuvan directs their attention to how they learn about the world around them, using the library, laboratory, internet, hands-on interactions, teaching learning resources, the arts, learning from events and field visits.

• Uniform: The uniform of the school is unisex. It represents a sunflower (the school logo) and is worn with black floaters or black shoes. The school has chosen this uniform because it believes in gender equality, treats all its students with respect, and is determined that they shall have a right to comfort, ease of movement and protection. I also understand that the spinning and weaving of the cloth of this uniform provides a livelihood for a women’s operative in Gujarat.

• Examinations: The school follows the pattern of continuous and comprehensive evaluation. There are no end-of-year examinations until Std. VIII. The school’s academic focus is on getting the children to understand and experience their learning so that they become life-long learners. The school ensures that its students emerge as winners in the grade 10 examination, with a strong value set and a rich enjoyment of their childhood.

• Study methods: The students learn the skills of self-study beginning in the pre-primary and primary phase. They are expected to undertake research, provide their own answers and come up with interesting questions. I am convinced that these will serve them in higher education as well as in their working life, and become a here for applying & logical there in the higher clam.

• Language: As a parent I will read regularly together with my child and make an active contribution to their language development especially in English, but also in the national language and the language of the state and community. Shishuvan believes that a rich vocabulary lends itself to high self-esteem, self-confidence and greater self-awareness and the ability to think abstractly. I agree with the school and will ensure I undertake this.

• Parental involvement: As the parent of a Shishuvan student I will actively participate in events, and field visits, I understand that the parents’ sabha and parenting workshops are mandatory. The school believes in the school partnering with parents to become active citizens of the world’s largest democracy. I will role model this approach along with the school, and will contribute to my future.

• Field Visits: I will actively participate and support the school as a volunteer on the field visits and will unconditionally allow my child to join the local field visits (pre-primary and primary) and outstation field visits (8 days from Std. V onwards). I understand these visits help connect classroom learning and real world experiences.

• Transport Policy: I will strictly adhere to the school’s transport policy. I will refrain from bringing private vehicles in the lanes adjoining the school. I will use the school bus for commuting of the child to and fro the school, unless I am residing in the walking distance from the school.


I have read & understood the above note on school's philosophy and pedagogy. I agree to accept and abide by them.

1. FILLING UP OF THIS FORM DOES NOT GUARANTEE THE ADMISSION OF YOUR CHILD.

2. Admission is strictly on merit. “NO DONATIONS ARE EXPECTED / ACCEPTED.

3. The school does not encourage any agents or management representatives for securing admissions. Please beware of any impostors. Dealings with such persons posing as agents / management representatives will be at your own risk and will not be binding on the school / management.

4. All decisions taken by the management concerning admissions will be final and indisputable.

5. Application form duly filled in should be submitted before the scheduled date / time. Late submission of application form will not be accepted / considered.

6. Incomplete forms will not be accepted / considered.

7. List of children selected for admission will be put up on the notice board on the scheduled date / time. <l>Intimation by email will be sent only to the applicants who are selected for the admission process.</l>

8. On your ward being selected for admission, the fees should be paid in full strictly within the stipulated time, failing which the admission will be given to the other child in waiting without any intimation to you.

9. ALL THE FEES PAID TO CONFIRM ADMISSION AND ANY FEES PAID THEREAFTER WILL NOT BE REFUNDED UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES AND FOR ANY REASON.

10. On the child being admitted to the school, it is compulsory to strictly adhere to the rules, regulations framed and disciplinary decisions / actions taken by the school.

11. The name of student absent from school for a period of one month or more without permission will be struck off the school register.

12. In case, any information/particulars furnished to seek admission to the School in the admission form or otherwise is found to be incorrect or misleading, the management reserves the right to cancel the admission, even after admission is granted.

I HAVE READ THE ABOVE INFORMATION ABOUT THE ADMISSION PROCESS AND THE SCHOOL’S PEDAGOGY AND PHILOSOPHY. I AGREE TO ACCEPT THEM AND AGREE TO ABIDE BY THEM.

I FURTHER ASSURE THAT ALL INFORMATION/PARTICULARS FURNISHED BY ME IN THE ADMISSION FORM ARE TRUE AND CORRECT AND BINDING.
